attributes.action: Regulate how companies such as Smart Parking Ltd run their sites & their fines
attributes.additional_details:
Example 1: Entering your car registration incorrectly by mistake does not get flagged on the machine. It will still take your money knowing that the specific registration you entered did not enter the car park. 

Example 2: Upon entering your registration it gives you an amount to pay, it is up to you to then increase the amount you are due to pay based on the time you have been parked. What if you have difficulties reading the signs? Or you simply do not know what time you entered the car park?
attributes.background: Companies such as Smart Parking Ltd are using covert tactics in order to catch out the everyday citizen in order to profit from unfairly issued parking fines. Their payment machines are not easy to use and honest mistakes led by genuine confusion are causing people to fall victim to their tactics.
